Statistical Rethinking - Reading Group 2020

Material for the Berlin Bayesian reading group covering Statistical Rethinking by Richard McElreath.

We follow the material from his last lecture series. You can either watch his lectures or read the book. To get access to the pdf-version, check out these slides (need to request access) or ask in our Slack. Additional resources can be found here.
